title: Monitor Cold Chain Shipment
description: A logistics coordinator must monitor a shipment of temperature-sensitive vaccines to ensure it remains within the required temperature range.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details for a specific vaccine shipment, including its route and temperature requirements (2-8°C).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the shipment and its required temperature range.

tasks.description: Access the real-time data from the temperature logger attached to the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully connects to the IoT sensor data stream.

tasks.description: Detect a temperature excursion alert indicating the temperature has risen to 9.5°C.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the alert and the deviation details.

tasks.description: Initiate a quality investigation and notify the recipient to quarantine the shipment upon arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a quality event and sends a notification to the destination site.
